word:
(Jeremiah 8:20; 1 John 3:3.) Will the Angel Pass Us By?--"And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure." In a little while every one who is a child of God will have His seal placed upon him. O that it may be placed upon our foreheads! Who can endure the thought of being passed by when the 
                                                                           970
angel goes forth to seal the servants of God in their foreheads (RH May 28, 1889)?
